Text:
ugh!  more pseudo-mysticism posed as a solution to the world's very material (and solvable) problems.

Plus, they have UFO-lover and anti-semite David Icke on the video, thus disqualifying this video from anything anyone would want to associate themselves with.

This film is verified by third-parties and has links to all of the facts sighted in the film.  Please, redjadevideo, stop contributing to the misinformation campaign of evil.  Refute the facts if you can, otherwise, stfu.
